1291190.name: Each Sale I Drink a Glass of Water
1291190.description:
Everyone the game is back on Steam! Add it to your wish list again!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1304140/Each_Sale_I_Drink_a_Glass_of_Water__The_Game

Hello and welcome to the weirdest game/experiment available on Steam!

The game/experiment is in Early Access for one year and every time someone buys it, I will record myself drinking a glass of water and add it to the game. The updates with the new clips will be added each Friday. Have fun watching me drink water!
1291190.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
